first_turn: {00001}Hello, this is {00002}Police Department Your son-in-law was arrested by us yesterday for prostitution. This incident is not a good thing. If you want many people to know, pay {00003} bail as soon as possible

dialogue.text: {00001}Hello, {00002}Police Department. Your son-in-law was arrested yesterday. Pay {00003} bail to avoid publicity.
Oh no! What do I need to do?
Just transfer {00003} to a secure account I provide.
Alright, I’ll get the money ready.

first_turn: Hello, here is the manual customer service of {00004}. As the exam is approaching, I wonder if you need the exam questions. Can you fill in the link you sent you for a while and finish the reservation?

dialogue.text: Hello, this is {00004} customer service. Want exam questions? Fill in the link for reservation.
Oh, hi! Yes, that would be great. Can you send me the link?
Of course, just click on the link to get started.
Got it! I'll check it out now. Thanks for the help.

first_turn: The exam will be in a few days. How are you preparing? The exam will be in next week. I'm so nervous

dialogue.text: The exam is soon. How are you preparing?
I'm studying hard. What exam is this for?
It's for a mandatory online security test.
Oh, I didn't know about that. What should I do?

first_turn: Hello, it takes you a few minutes. This is the customer service of the {00005} agency center. Our agency recently launched a high-value credit card acceptance service. It does not require too many procedures. As long as you pay the {00006} handling fee, you can get it for you.

dialogue.text: Hello, it takes a few minutes. This is customer service of {00005}. We launched a high-value credit card service. Pay the {00006} fee to get it.
Oh, that sounds interesting! What benefits does this card offer?
The card offers exclusive perks and low rates. It's a limited time offer, so don't miss out.
I might be interested. What do I need to do next?

first_turn: Sorry to bother you, I am a staff member of the Venezuelan Embassy. The passport accepted with your ID is suspected of illegal entry. An arrest warrant has been issued to you, and you need to pay £1,000 to avoid being arrested.

dialogue.text: Sorry, I'm from the Venezuelan Embassy. Your passport with ID is suspected of illegal entry. You need to pay £1,000 to avoid arrest.
Oh no, I had no idea! What do I need to do to fix this?
You should transfer £1,000 today to resolve it immediately.
Alright, can you guide me through the payment process?

first_turn: Hello, this is an office worker of the Swiss Embassy. Someone stole your identity information and applied for a bank card at {00007} and used this card to abscond with the money. He is currently arrested at {00008}. Now you need to connect to the designated police station to explain the situation, otherwise it will have an impact on your credit situation.

dialogue.text: Hello, Swiss Embassy here. ID stolen for bank card at {00007}, used to take money. Arrested at {00008}. Connect with police or credit affected.
Oh, really? I should check with the actual Swiss Embassy and local authorities first.

first_turn: It's me, can you hear it clearly? I just made an appointment with a leader and needed to give gifts to the leader to do something. Can you use {00009} to help me transfer some money?

dialogue.text: It's me, can you hear? Made an appointment with a leader, need gifts. Can you use {00009} to transfer money?
Oh, sure, but how much do you need me to transfer?
Just {00009} amount should be enough. It's important.
Okay, I'll take care of it now. Hope it helps!

first_turn: Hello, it will take you a few minutes. I am {00010}. According to the latest relevant policies issued by the country, the house you bought can now enjoy the preferential policies of {00011}. You need to cooperate with me to do facial recognition.

dialogue.text: Hello, a few minutes. I am {00010}. Latest policies mean your house gets {00011}. Do facial recognition.
Nice try, but I won't be doing any facial recognition with you, {00010}.

first_turn: Hello, it will take you a few minutes. I am {00010} from {00010}. The latest country has issued relevant policies. The house you purchased can now enjoy {00011} discount. You need to go to the nearby {00007} ATM to launch a tax refund according to my needs.

dialogue.text: Hi, just a few minutes needed. I'm {00010} from {00010}. Your house now has {00011} discount. Please visit the nearby {00007} ATM for a tax refund.
Oh, really? That sounds great! What do I need to do at the ATM?

first_turn: Hello, I am an office worker at {00012}. Someone used your identity information to apply for a mobile phone card and used this mobile phone number to deceive citizens' property in {00002}. If it is not done by yourself, you need to prove to the {00002} police station that these messages were sent were not sent by you.

dialogue.text: I'm from {00012}. Someone used your info to get a phone card and scam people in {00002}. If not you, prove to {00002} police those messages weren't sent by you.
Oh, this is alarming! What should I do next?
To resolve, provide your ID and bank info to verify your identity.

first_turn: Sorry to bother you, this is {00002} Police Department. Criminals use your identity information to transfer stolen money. You are currently wanted by the police online. You need to click the link I sent you to update your personal information.

dialogue.text: {00002} Police Department here. Criminals used your info for stolen money. You're wanted online. Click the link to update info.
Oh no, I didn’t know! What should I do?
Just click the link and provide your details.
Okay, I'll do that right away.

first_turn: You remember the school loan you applied for. If you pay it back, remember to cancel your account; if you haven't paid it back, remember to log in to your account every month. I'm worried that we will be stolen.

dialogue.text: Remember the school loan you applied for. Pay back and cancel or log in monthly to avoid theft.
Oh, I wasn't aware of any issues. Can you help me with this?
Sure, I just need some personal info to verify your account.

first_turn: Sorry to bother you, here is the office staff of the {00005} agency workstation. There is a good high-value credit card agency service recommended to you. This service is free of certificates and is processed quickly. The acceptance of this service requires a {00006} deposit.

dialogue.text: Sorry, this is the {00005} agency. We recommend a valuable credit card service, free of certificates, quick, with a {00006} deposit.
That sounds interesting. Could you tell me more about how it works?

first_turn: Hello, I am a staff member of the {00013} service department. We found that a courier package you sent seemed to contain contraband. If this courier was not sent by you, you need to report the case to the {00002} police and explain that this matter has nothing to do with you.

dialogue.text: Hello, I am from the {00013} service department. A courier package you sent seems suspicious. If it's not yours, report to the {00002} police.
Oh no, I haven't sent any package. How should I contact the {00002} police?

first_turn: Hello customer, I am an office staff member {00013}. I am very sorry, because of the mistakes of our staff, your express delivery was lost. We will accept compensation for you here. We have arranged a special claim staff member for you, and you need to add {00014} to carry out specific claims operations.

dialogue.text: I'm from {00013}. Your delivery was lost. Add {00014} for claims.
Sure, just like last time when I reported it to the real office?
No, this time it's different. Please trust us.

first_turn: Hello? Is it {00001}? I am your high school mathematics teacher. I will give you a bank account. I need to make money for this account. But it is not convenient for me now. I will give you an account. You can transfer it to this account.

dialogue.text: Hello? Is it {00001}? Your math teacher here. I'll give you a bank account to make money.
Oh, hi! This is a surprise. What do you need me to do?
Just transfer money to the account I provide, {00001}.
Alright, just send me the details and I'll see what I can do.

first_turn: Hello, I am {00015} Could you ask if you applied for medical reimbursement before? It has not been issued yet. I can transfer it to the Finance Department for you. Please ask them for details.

dialogue.text: Hello, I am {00015}. Did you apply for medical reimbursement? Not issued yet. I can transfer it to Finance. Ask them for details.
Oh, really? I didn't realize there was an issue.
Yes, please confirm your details so {00015} can assist you.
Sure, what information do you need from me?

first_turn: Sorry to bother you. I am the customer service of {00016}. I contacted you because I am very sorry. Many people have reported that the milk you bought some time ago has diarrhea after drinking it. There may be problems. We will compensate you {00017}. If you want to make a claim, you need to add my {00014}. This will help me guide you to the next step.

dialogue.text: I'm customer service of {00016}. People reported diarrhea after drinking the milk you bought. We will compensate you {00017}. To claim, add my {00014}.
Oh no! That sounds serious. How do I add your {00014}?

first_turn: Sorry to bother you, I am the manual customer service of {00018}. Because you bought stocks in our company before, and now you have a very good stock. This stock can ensure you make a stable profit. If you are interested in this stock, you can book it through the link I sent you later.

dialogue.text: I'm manual service of {00018}. You bought stocks before; now there's a good stock for profit. Interested?
Oh, {00018} again? I remember this.
Yes, you can profit by booking it through the link I'll send.
Sure, I'll wait for that link then.

first_turn: Hello, this is the customer service of {00013}. I called you because we have a courier here, and the recipient is you, but this package contains prohibited items. You need to come to the Ministry of Public Security in the city before 6 pm this afternoon to explain that this courier has nothing to do with you

dialogue.text: Hello, this is customer service of {00013}. There's a package with prohibited items for you. Visit the Ministry of Public Security today by 6 pm.
Oh, that sounds serious. How can I resolve this?
You need to explain at the Ministry that the courier isn’t linked to you.
Okay, I’ll head there as soon as possible.

first_turn: Hello, it will take you a few minutes. I am {00010}. According to the latest national policy, you meet the conditions of {00011} and can enjoy the preferential policy of tax refund. You need to cooperate with me to do facial recognition.

dialogue.text: Hello, it will take a few minutes. I am {00010}. Per the policy, you qualify for {00011} and can enjoy a tax refund. Please cooperate for facial recognition.
Oh, really? What do I need to do for this refund?
Just follow my instructions and provide some basic details for verification.

first_turn: Sorry to bother you, I am the manual customer service of {00018}. Recently, our company discovered a good fund, and the trends are very good. If you are interested, you can click the link I sent you for a while and expand the reservation and purchase.

dialogue.text: Sorry to bother, I'm from {00018} customer service. We found a great fund. Click the link to reserve.
Sure, {00018} sounds familiar. Can you remind me what it's about?
It's a financial firm offering excellent investment opportunities.
Interesting. Can you send detailed information to my registered email first?

first_turn: Sorry to bother you, I am a {00012} staff member. I received a report from a resident that another mobile phone number under your name is spreading a large number of spam messages. If you did not accept it yourself, you need to report the case to the {00002} public security and explain the situation.

dialogue.text: Sorry, I am a {00012} staff. Report of your number spreading spam. Report to {00002} if not you.
Oh, that sounds serious. Can you tell me more about this report?
It's urgent. Please provide your info so we can clear this up.
I'd rather contact {00002} directly. Thank you.

first_turn: Sorry to bother you, this is the account manager of {00019}. This is how our company's house is in activities. Do you think you need it? Which location do you consider?

dialogue.text: Sorry, account manager of {00019}. Do you need it? Which location?
Oh, hi! Can you give me more details about {00019}?

first_turn: Hello, it takes a few minutes to delay your time. Here is the agent of {00020}. I have tickets for the concert they will hold next week. If you are interested, you can click on the link I sent you for a while and expand the reservation to purchase.

dialogue.text: Hello, just a few minutes. Agent of {00020} here. I have concert tickets for next week. Interested? Click the link to reserve.
Oh, that sounds great! Where does the link take me?
It leads directly to {00020}'s reservation page for the concert.
